title: ‘Highly likely’ that rare poison killed Putin nemesis Navalny, Europeans say
summary_full: Toxin found in poison dart frogs probably killed Alexei Navalny in a Russian prison, five countries announced on the two-year anniversary of his death.
summary_public: Toxin found in poison dart frogs probably killed Alexei Navalny in a Russian prison, five countries announced on the two-year anniversary of his death.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: killed Putin nemesis Navalny... in a Russian prison
